alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 03 at 4:56PM MDT until September 03 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Box Elder County in northern Utah... * Until 530 PM MDT * At 456 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Park Valley, or 25 miles west of Snowville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Curlew Junction, Locomotive Springs and Standrod. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 0 and 5. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 55 and 90. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
